section.title: Load Test
section.para: A load test tool is a tool which emulates user and system actions on an application to measure the reaction and behavior of this system. A load test tool is commonly used for a web application to measure its behavior.

Popular tools for load testing are:
Apache JMeter - See http://jakarta.apache.org/jmeter/
Eclipse TPTP testing tool - See http://www.eclipse.org/tptp/
Grinder - See http://grinder.sourceforge.net/
